You're a child development expert. We want to learn from you!

Write For Us

We need you – leading early education experts who can share your knowledge with eager parents and teachers.

Parenting is hard and teaching takes skill. And in this digital age, we’re saturated and overwhelmed by info. We want to parent and teach the best we can, based on research and expert recommendations, but we simply don’t have time to read everything that’s out there. That’s where Plinkit comes in. We need you to:

  • Help parents better understand their child’s development and provide them with practical, easy-to-implement tools to support their child’s learning.
  • Make Plinkit the go-to resource for quickly finding the most important and useful kid-centric information. (P.S. – We pride ourselves on having stellar original content.)

About the Ideal Contributor

  • Reads Plinkit.
  • Is passionate about early education and communicating in an impactful, down-to-earth way.
  • Has 10+ years of practical early childhood education experience (in the classroom, with clients, etc.).
  • Has an innate sense for what really matters to parents and teachers – interesting and doable.
  • Can’t stop thinking of fresh and innovative kid-centric tips and tricks.
  • Loves reading early childhood education research, websites, blogs and other media.
  • Able to write relatable, practical and engaging content based on a proven structure.
  • Is very detail oriented and highly organized – and not shy about it.
  • Is an audacious self-starter who gets things done and asks a million questions.

How it Works

Have a topic in mind? Or want to tap into the long list of topics from our readers? Contact us and we’ll get you started. We review each application very carefully, and will be in touch if there’s a fit.
